content: simple slouch hat abbreviations co = cast on k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together round = round sts = stitches directions using long tail method co 56 64 72 80 sts place marker to join being careful not to twist round 1 k all sts around repeat round 1 until hat measures 8 9 10 11 from co edge this slouchy beanie is perfect for first-time knitters basic techniques make it a quick knit for shape crown all skill levels and the modern style makes it the perfect gift decrease round 1 k2tog around repeat decrease round 1 until you can no longer yarn work in the round one skein i love this yarn 100% acrylic 355 yards/325 meters per 198 grams finishing needles us 9 / 5 5 mm 16 circular needle break yarn leaving a long tail use darning needle to thread yarn through remaining sts pull yarn tight and secure notions darning needle for weaving in ends weave in all ends gauge share 16 sts x 20 row = 4 in stockinette i d love to see your finished hats tag your projects #simpleslouch on instagram to share sizes baby toddler child adult = 14 16 18 20 inches wide un-stretched she makes hats - http //www shemakeshats com for pattern support robyn@shemakeshats com pattern for personal use only
